Uses of Class
market.traders.Trader

Packages that use Trader
Package
Description
market.entityCreator
Package with tools needed to create all kind of object in the simulation.
market.gui
Package with all controllers needed to create and manage GUI.
market.interfaces
Just definitions of miscelenous interfaces which are implemented by some objects.
market.markets
Objects on which we can buy and sell differents goods
market.traders
Package with different type of traders, each of them behaves a little bit differently.
market.transactions
Tools for handiling single transaction between Dealer and Trader.
market.world
Tools for creating a container of all objects in the simulation, using which different objects can communicate with one another.

    void
    PositiveTransactionSystem.buyOperation(Dealer dealer, Trader trader, Asset wantedAsset, float amount, World world)
    This function at first check if Trader has enough of Trading Tcurrency to buy wanted Asset -> If not It exchanges traders assets for trading currency until he has enough of tradingCurrency If it is still not enough it sell to the trader that amount on what they have enough money.
